alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 7:34PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF JEFFERSON... NORTHERN OSWEGO...AND LEWIS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band will continue to produce snowfall rates of around 2 inches per hour across central and southern Jefferson County, far northern Oswego County, and northwestern Lewis County through mid evening. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...This band of heavy lake effect snow will remain nearly stationary through mid evening. The band will continue to impact Watertown, Adams, Fort Drum, Carthage, Harrisville, and the northern Tug Hill Plateau. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 37 and 48. SAFETY INFO...Travel in this band will be extremely difficult. The snow will accumulate so rapidly that it will be difficult for the road crews to keep the roads clear. Blowing and drifting snow will lower visibility below a quarter mile in this band. &&
